Articles.Content: I have been fiddling around with various different configurations and I cannot seem to get KSP to recognize any gyro inputs from my steam controller. Is the gyro supported at all for this game? If so, what broad settings are needed to get the game to accept its input?
Hi, unfortunately no analog input from Steam controllers are recognized currently by KSP. Keys should work, but sure that's not enough.

Ouch. Well that sucks. Guess I'll stick to flying planes with a lame keyboard...

Thanks for the answer though.

While technically true, The steam controller does emulate analog pretty well for the stick, and can be adjusted in steam's controller settings. Combined with Atmospheric autopilot (Not what it sounds like, think fly-by-wire. But it can do that to.) The result is very smooth.
